subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Dominique Rollin of Canada won the nearly seven-hour fourth stage, and Levi Leipheimer of Santa Rosa retained his race lead Thursday in the Tour of California.
snippet: Dominique Rollin of Canada won the nearly seven-hour fourth stage, and Levi Leipheimer of Santa Rosa retained his race lead Thursday in the Tour of California.
